What is new? (Change log)
=========================

The change log keeps you informed about newly introduced or changed
features and behavior of PyAstronomy.

New version will, of course, contain bug fixes for bugs we became aware of.
Most likely, we will also have introduced new, better bugs to keep things
interesting...
